Stickers

I have always loved stickers. Stickers make boring things, like your work laptop or a lamp post, much more fun. For my birthday, I got Silhouette Portrait 3 — a cutting machine — to be able to make my own stickers at home.

If you would like to collaborate, commission me, but existing ones or just have your design printed-and-cut on a nice sticker paper, drop me a line!

WordCloud.app collaboration

My dear friend Elena is founder of WordCloud.app — an app that puts your words into shape. I made a bunch of die-cut stickers for her, and a small sticker sheet.

(Full gallery here, I am somewhat lazy with setting it up on Jekyll right now)

Cats! Cats! Cats!

I love all cats and I cannot lie. Which is why I made sticker sheet with my cats…

I also made similar stickers for my mom, some of my friends and my cat-sitting clients. Read more here.

Other designs

Have I mentioned that I love stickers? You can check out other designs on my Ko-fi page, on Instagram, or Etsy shop.
